20110120022602.000|20110120022605.000|CC1|         lung function.         
20110120022605.000|20110120022607.000|CC1|  Unlike most COPD medications, 
20110120022607.000|20110120022607.000|CC1|         VAVAIR contains        
20110120022607.000|20110120022609.000|CC1|    both an anti-inflammatory   
20110120022609.000|20110120022609.000|CC1|        and a long-acting       
20110120022609.000|20110120022611.000|CC1|         bronchodilator,        
20110120022611.000|20110120022613.000|CC1|        working together        
20110120022613.000|20110120022613.000|CC1|         to help improve        
20110120022613.000|20110120022615.000|CC1|   your lung function all day.  
20110120022615.000|20110120022615.000|CC1|      ADVAIR won't replace      
20110120022615.000|20110120022617.000|CC1|      fast-acting inhalers      
20110120022617.000|20110120022619.000|CC1|       for sudden symptoms      
20110120022619.000|20110120022619.000|CC1|     and should not be used     
20110120022619.000|20110120022621.000|CC1|     more than twice a day.     
20110120022621.000|20110120022621.000|CC1|        People with COPD        
20110120022621.000|20110120022623.000|CC1|          taking ADVAIR         
20110120022623.000|20110120022623.000|CC1|        may have a higher       
20110120022623.000|20110120022625.000|CC1|      chance of pneumonia.      
20110120022625.000|20110120022625.000|CC1|    ADVAIR may increase your    
20110120022625.000|20110120022628.000|CC1|      risk of osteoporosis      
20110120022628.000|20110120022629.000|CC1|     and some eye problems.     
20110120022629.000|20110120022629.000|CC1|  Tell your doctor if you have  
20110120022629.000|20110120022631.000|CC1|        a heart ndndition       
20110120022631.000|20110120022631.000|CC1|     or high blood pressure     
20110120022631.000|20110120022634.000|CC1|      before taking ADVAIR.     
20110120022634.000|20110120022634.000|CC1|     If you're still having     
20110120022634.000|20110120022636.000|CC1|      difficulty breathing,     
20110120022636.000|20110120022637.000|CC1|         take the lead.         
20110120022637.000|20110120022637.000|CC1|       Ask your doctor if       
20110120022637.000|20110120022639.000|CC1|        including ADVAIR        
20110120022639.000|20110120022639.000|CC1|       could help improve       
20110120022639.000|20110120022641.000|CC1|       your lung function.
